page.title: 20SCHOOL
page.content: My{playschool}was a small one, run from the woman's own house. We all used to like playing on the slide and climbing frame best but we had a lego table and a plasticine table. Lego are bricks which snap together to build different shapes in bright colours. Plasticine is a sort of toy clay. We also had easy to read ladybird books and a mini, indoor see-saw. At 4 - 5 years old I left {playschool}to go to{ Primary School where we played with toys less and learned to read, write and use our imaginations. At 9 years old I moved on to{Fairlands Middle School.}This school is really a continuation of the Primary School. Finally this September I leave to go to the{Kings of Wessex. Here I will take my GCSE which involves taking exams to get grades for qualifications to get a good job.
